cause.description:
Children of Afghanistan Hope Project is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization with one humble goal: to provide education to the children of Afghanistan. CAHP is currently trying to rebuild the war torn country. Our mission is to begin the restoration by contributing and facilitating the development of educational institutions throughout various provinces of Afghanistan. CAHP is also working to establish vocational training programs to assist the children, orphans and women of Afghanistan; creating self-sustaining individuals with solid futures.
ATTENTION !!!
PLEASE MAKE DONATIONS through our OFFICIAL WEBSITE, NOT through facebook!
Through our website 100% of your donations will used for the children at the two schools that have been established by CAHP in Afghanistan.
www.cahopeproject.com
1. Help Rebuild Afghanistan!
2. Help Educate Orphans and Women!
3. Make a difference in a community across the world!
